Mary's job is suffering due to family obligations.

Explanation:

Mary has been working on her own side project, which is a significant source of income for the family. However, due to the increased workload, she has had to miss work more frequently. This has caused financial strain on the family, as well as added stress to Mary's already demanding schedule. As a result, she has had to take on additional responsibilities at home to make up for the missed work. This has caused a disproportionate amount of the workload to fall on her shoulders, leading to a decline in her job performance.
